title: Progressbar95
description: Progressbar95 is a unique indie game with a strong nostalgic vibe. It turns vintage GUI elements like panels, buttons and icons into game elements! Fights against virtual office assistants, calculators, annoying pop-ups and maddening visual glitches. Use a terminal to hack thing and search for bonuses. The game will make you smile!

system_requirements.OS: *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista, or XP Service Pack 3
